root.name: Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy
root.description: Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy is the eighth Spyro game, as well as the first developed by Vicarious Visions. Antagonists Dr. Cortex of Crash Bandicoot fame, and Ripto of Spyro the Dragon fame, have teamed up to wreck havoc on the world! Spyro the Dragon and Crash Bandicoot must team up to save the world! The game is predominately a single player side-scrolling platform, but minigame challenges, such as a Breakout! clone, make up a sizable chunk of the game.
